creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: ex coll.Grosjean Coll.  Imperial Palace Fond D'or Sapphire blue velvet hanging.  Deep blue velvet, voided to show a sumptuous design in gold picked out in cinnamon brown.  The field is patterned with six formulized lotus blossoms surrounding a large central blossom, all supported on interlaced leaf scrolling, three fret and floral borders.
title: Palace Hanging
